content.description: A client side story clone that allows users to upload an image as a 'story' which will vanish after 24 hours
content.intro: This is my take on the popular 'stories' format you see everywhere these days, made in React and fully local!
content.body: Upload your own images and view them for up to 24 hours
content.conclusion: Give it a spin below! The whole project with tech stack and expanded information can be found on my GitHub

content.description: A minimalist reddit client that loads the newest content from user selected subreddits
content.intro: Everyone should have their own Reddit client, and mine is for the newest information available!
content.body: Select your own, or pick a starter pack of subreddits to get the newest information from in a minimal format
content.conclusion: Note: currently using a simple API call that is highly limited

content.description: Landing page for music producer and artist pronouncedyea
content.intro: One of my first projects was making a landing page for my professional artist project.
content.body: Over the years it went through many changes until this most recent 2025 update
content.conclusion: This page was inspired by modern trends while remaining thematically consistent with the music

content.description: A browser based quiz-app & template that features time and score based multiple choice based questions
content.intro: Combining games with webdev led to this browser based quiz
content.body: While the aesthetic is static, the quiz content can be easily modified by uploading your own JSON file in the correct quiz format
content.conclusion: Try it out yourself! Replace the current JSON and try out your own quiz!

content.description: Mobile-first straightforward weather app that returns standard weather information using the Visual Crossing API
content.intro: This project was built to practice API calls in a realistic and practical way

content.description: Rapid PA representative mailing address lookup designed for mobile.
content.intro: Inspired by a real life event where I needed to quickly find my representatives address
content.body: Using the existing government lookup on my phone made me realize how much friction there was in the process
content.conclusion: Unfortunately, unable to find an alternative to Google Civic Info, this project is currently non-functioning although the framework is all set up for when an alternative is found.

content.description: Example project setting up a simple backend + simple frontend for a basic CRUD blog
content.intro: This project demonstrates a basic CRUD blog using only Express on the backend and vanilla HTML,CSS,JS on the frontend
content.body: This project uses local file system to store blog posts, but could be swapped to a database in the future

content.description: Other small projects/backend projects can be found on my github
content.intro: Here you can find a variety of projects I've worked on since the very beginning
content.body: If you have any questions please contact me!
content.conclusion: Always looking forward to discussing projects together!
